name: Beeso IT Limited
tagline: London IT Support and Services Company
description: At Beeso IT, we specialize in managed services and consultancy.  We focus on select core service areas: cloud solutions, data protection, tech consultancy, support, automation, and user experience. We provide a complete IT package based on your business requirements. Packages are infinitely scalable, so you can flex up or down whenever you need to. Our consultants work with you to build your package from the very best technologies.
